thread.title: Hyatt Place Gurgaon/Udyog Vihar wins Today’s Traveler Award 2015 for Best Upcoming Business Hotel in Gurgaon.Travelandtourworld.com
thread.title_full: Hyatt Place Gurgaon/Udyog Vihar wins Today’s Traveler Award 2015 for Best Upcoming Business Hotel in Gurgaon.Travelandtourworld.com

author: travelandtourworld.com
title: Hyatt Place Gurgaon/Udyog Vihar wins Today’s Traveler Award 2015 for Best Upcoming Business Hotel in Gurgaon.Travelandtourworld.com
text:
Hyatt Place Gurgaon/Udyog Vihar wins Today’s Traveler Award 2015 for Best Upcoming Business Hotel in Gurgaon. Published on : Tuesday, August 18, 2015
Hyatt Place Gurgaon/Udyog Vihar wins Today’s Traveler Award 2015 for Best Upcoming Business Hotel in Gurgaon. The 9th Annual Today’s Traveler Awards, 2015, organized by Gill India Group, took place at a magnificent event at Taj Palace, New Delhi, on August 11, 2015.
The Chief Guest, Dr Mahesh Sharma, Minister of State (I/C) for Tourism & Culture and Minister of State for Civil Aviation, Government of India, launched the cover of the Today’s Traveler Coffee Table Book 2015 – ‘Success Redefined,’ and gave away the 9thAnnual Today’s Traveler awards to the industry’s best.
Mr. Sumit Kumar, General Manager and Ms. Reema Dhawan, Director of Sales received the Award on behalf of Hyatt Place Gurgaon/Udyog Vihar.
Express his delight on receiving the award Mr. Sumit Kumar, General Manager, Hyatt Place Gurgaon/Udyog Vihar said,” It is a great moment of pride for the Hotel as this is the third award for the hotel with not even completing a year of operations. Hyatt Place as a brand is so liked by the business traveller as We are all about style and convenience . We communicate this identity through our friendly tone, vibrant visual elements and with a sense of professionalism.”
Source:- Hyatt
